post.description:
Creates a session. Up to 150 sessions can be created.
A session refers to the continuous interaction between the user and Powerdrill within a conversation.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The API key used for authorization.

languageType.title: 输出语言类型
languageType.description:
Specifies the language in which the output is generated. The value of this parameter is a key-value pair, where the key defines the language, and the value serves as the comment. Possible values are: 
   "AUTO": None,
    "EN": "English",
    "ES": "Spanish",
    "AR": "Arabic",
    "PT": "Portuguese",
    "ID": "Indonesian",
    "JA": "Japanese",
    "RU": "Russian",
    "HI": "Hindi",
    "FR": "French",
    "DE": "German",
    "VI": "Vietnamese",
    "TR": "Turkish",
    "PL": "Polish",
    "IT": "Italian",
    "KO": "Korean",
    "ZH-CN": "Simplified Chinese",
    "ZH-TW": "Traditional Chinese"

mediaTtl.title: 媒体生命周期
mediaTtl.description: The valid duration for accessible links generated for media files, such as images in the units of seconds. The value range is 1 to 6000 and defaults to 3600 (1 hour).

maxMessagesInContext.title: 上下文的消息数量上限
maxMessagesInContext.description: The maximum number of messages retained per session, with a value range of 1 to 30 and a default of 10.

colorIndex.title: 色卡属性列表
colorIndex.description: The list of color palette attributes, with values in RGB hexadecimal format such as #FF0000.

chatMode.title: 对话模式
chatMode.description: Chat mode: Possible values are ALL and DATA_ANALYTICS. When set to ALL, Powerdrill will automatically detect your intent and select the appropriate chat mode. When set to DATA_ANALYTICS, Powerdrill will focus specifically on data analysis.

code.title: 业务码
code.description:
Status code. 0 indicates that the session is created. Otherwise, the operation fails. Possible error codes include:
100: Bad request.
201: Request frequency limit.
9999: Internal error.
100001: Invalid operation.
100105: maxMessageInContext parameter value must be 1 to 30.
100106: mediaTtl parameter value must be 1 to 6000.
211001: The number of sessions have reached the upper limit of 150.

post.description:
A dataset is a collection of data sources. 

You can upload various types of data sources into a single dataset, with each dataset supporting up to 10 data sources.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The API key used for authorization.

code.title: 业务码
code.description:
Status code. 0 indicates that the operation is successful. Otherwise, the operation fails. Possible error codes include:
100: Bad request.
201: Request frequency limit.
9999: Internal error.
100001: Invalid operation.

get.description: Lists datasets in your Teamspace or of the specified name.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The number of pages to display.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of records displayed per page.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The dataset name.

code.title: 业务码
code.description:
Status code. 0 indicates that the operation is successful. Otherwise, the operation fails. Possible error codes include:
100: Bad request.
201: Request frequency limit.
9999: Internal error.
100001: Invalid operation.

pageSize.description: The number of items displayed per page.

total.description: The total number of pages displayed.

data.description: The information about the dataset list.

delete.description: Deletes the specified dataset. Once deleted, all data sources within the dataset will also be permanently removed and cannot be recovered.

parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: The dataset ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The API key used for authorization.

code.title: 业务码
code.description:
Status code. 0 indicates that the operation is successful. Otherwise, the operation fails. Possible error codes include:
100: Bad request.
201: Request frequency limit.
9999: Internal error.
100001: Invalid operation.

data.description: A null value is returned if the operation is successful.

patch.description: Modifies information about the specified dataset.

parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: The dataset ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The API key used for authorization.

name.description: The new name of the dataset. name and description cannot be both blank.

description.description: The new description of the dataset. name and description cannot be both blank.

code.title: 业务码
code.description:
Status code. 0 indicates that the operation is successful. Otherwise, the operation fails. Possible error codes include:
100: Bad request.
201: Request frequency limit.
9999: Internal error.
100001: Invalid operation.

data.description: Null if the operation is successful.

get.description: Obtains the status of the specified dataset.

parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: The dataset ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The API key used for authorization.

code.title: 业务码
code.description:
Status code. 0 indicates that the operation is successful. Otherwise, the operation fails. Possible error codes include:
100: Bad request.
201: Request frequency limit.
9999: Internal error.
100001: Invalid operation.

data.description:
Dataset status. Possible values are:
synched: All data sources in the dataset are synchronized.
processing: At least one data source is currently being synchronized.
part_error: Synchronization failed for at least one data source.
empty_datasource: The dataset contains no data sources.

post.description: Creates a data source in the specified dataset. Note that one dataset can contain up to 10 data sources.

parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: The dataset ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The API key used for authorization.

code.title: 业务码
code.description:
Status code. 0 indicates that the operation is successful. Otherwise, the operation fails. Possible error codes include:
100: Bad request.
201: Request frequency limit.
9999: Internal error.
100001: Invalid operation.

get.description: Lists data sources contained in the specified dataset.

parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: The dataset ID.

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: The number of pages to display.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of records displayed per page.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The data source name.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: An extended field. Set it to preSignUrl to return a presigned URL.

code.title: 业务码
code.description:
Status code. 0 indicates that the operation is successful. Otherwise, the operation fails. Possible error codes include:
100: Bad request.
201: Request frequency limit.
9999: Internal error.
100001: Invalid operation.

total.description: The total number of records displayed.

pageSize.description: The number of records displayed per page.

records.description: The information about each listed data source.

data.description: The information about the listed data sources.

delete.description: Deletes the specified data source from the specified dataset. Once deleted, the data source cannot be recovered.

parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: The ID of the dataset that contains the data source.

parameters.name: datasourceId
parameters.description: The data source ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The API key used for authorization.

code.title: 业务码
code.description:
Status code. 0 indicates that the operation is successful. Otherwise, the operation fails. Possible error codes include:
100: Bad request.
201: Request frequency limit.
9999: Internal error.
100001: Invalid operation.

data.description: Null returned if the operation is successful.

get.description: Obtains information about the specified data source.

parameters.name: datasetId
parameters.description: The ID of the dataset that contains the data source.

parameters.name: datasourceId
parameters.description: The data source ID.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: An extended field. Set it to preSignUrl to return a presigned URL.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The API key used for authorization.

code.title: 业务码
code.description:
Status code. 0 indicates that the operation is successful. Otherwise, the operation fails. Possible error codes include:
100: Bad request.
201: Request frequency limit.
9999: Internal error.
100001: Invalid operation.

post.description: Creates a data source without specifying a dataset. Powerdrill will automatically generate a dataset for it.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: The API key used for authorization.

name.description: The name of the data source.

type.description: The type of the data source, for example, FILE.

url.description: The URL of the file for public access.

ext.description: The file name extension. Supported file extensions include: csv, tsv, pdf, md, mdx, json, txt, pptx, docx, xls, and xlsx.

code.title: 业务码
code.description:
Status code. 0 indicates that the operation is successful. Otherwise, the operation fails. Possible error codes include:
100: Bad request.
201: Request frequency limit.
9999: Internal error.
100001: Invalid operation.

post.description: Chats with your data. You can ask anything you want to know from your data.

datasourceIdList.description: Specifies the IDs of the data sources to use in the conversation, rather than the entire dataset. You can specify up to 1,000 data sources.

history.description: If this parameter is not provided or is empty, the session's historical messages will be used. The maximum of historical messages is determined by the maxMessagesInContext parameter configured for the session.

languageType.description:
Specifies the language in which the output is generated. The value of this parameter is a key-value pair, where the key defines the language, and the value serves as the comment. Possible values are:
    "AUTO": None,
    "EN": "English",
    "ES": "Spanish",
    "AR": "Arabic",
    "PT": "Portuguese",
    "ID": "Indonesian",
    "JA": "Japanese",
    "RU": "Russian",
    "HI": "Hindi",
    "FR": "French",
    "DE": "German",
    "VI": "Vietnamese",
    "TR": "Turkish",
    "PL": "Polish",
    "IT": "Italian",
    "KO": "Korean",
    "ZH-CN": "Simplified Chinese",
    "ZH-TW": "Traditional Chinese"
languageType.title: 输出语言设置

chatMode.title: 对话模式
chatMode.description: The chat mode. Possible values are ALL and DATA_ANALYTICS. If you set it to ALL, Powerdrill will automatically recognize your intention and choose the right chat mode. If you set it to DATA_ANALYTICS, Powerdrill will perform data analysis.

type.description: The type of the data source.

url.description: The URL of the data source.

status.title: 文件同步状态
status.description:
The processing status of the data source, with possible values:
- **pending**: Awaiting processing.
- **running**: Currently processing.
- **synched**: Successfully synchronized.
- **error**: Processing failed.
- **usage_limit_reached**: Quota limit reached.

name.description: The name of the data source.

type.description: The type of the data source, for example, FILE.

url.description: The URL of the file for public access.

ext.description: The file name extension. Supported file extensions include: csv, tsv, pdf, md, mdx, json, txt, pptx, docx, xls, and xlsx.

code.title: 业务码
code.description:
Status code. 0 indicates that the operation is successful. Otherwise, the operation fails. Possible error codes include:
100: Bad request.
201: Request frequency limit.
9999: Internal error.
100001: Invalid operation.
